body.name: Zipp Battery YTX12-BS Rechargeable Motorcycle and ATV Battery - Sealed AGM - Maintenance Free - Replacement for Honda, Kawasaki, Suzuki, Yamaha
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 10 hrs 9 mins
features: BATTERY TYPE: YTX12-BS Absorbent Glass Mat battery is rechargeable AGM battery fits in a variety of applications.

TOP TECHNOLOGY: The Acid inside is constructed with Absorbed Glass Mat technology allowing for a low-maintenance and spill proof battery. Patented sealed post prevents corrosion, which gives extended battery life.
EASY APPLICATION: Zipp Battery batteries come fully charged and ready to go once delivered. Simply connect your battery to the application and you are ready to go.
PRECISE VOLTAGE REGULATION: Zipp Battery batteries maintain precise voltage levels, ensuring consistent and stable power delivery for your devices.
UNBEATABLE WARRANTY: Top notch customer service from real battery experts! Guaranteed 12 Months warranty with 15-day refund policy.
body.description: Zipp Battery introduces YTX12-BS sealed AGM batteries, expertly crafted for the budget-conscious consumer. Equipped with lead calcium alloy and absorbed glass mat (AGM) technology which allows a complete maintenance-free and high-performance operation. Fiberglass mat separators and high cell compression extend battery life by providing superior vibration resistance from the most extreme conditions. Rigorously tested to ensure safety, Zipp Battery sets the benchmark for reliability at an affordable price point.YTX12-BS is a 12V 18CCA High Performance Sealed AGM BatteryYTX12-BS has AGM Separators for superior design and durability.YTX12-BS Battery Features:Patented sealed post prevents corrosion which gives extended battery life. No spills, no leaks, and no water to check. Extreme vibration resistance to ensure maximum conductivity. High Cranking Amps & Low Self-Discharge RateOEM compatibility. Ready for Immediate use. YTX12-BS Battery Specifications:Model: YTX12-BSDimensions : (H) 5.12" x (L) 5.91" (W) 3.43"Weight: 8.46 lbs.Volts: 12VPolarity: [+ -]Condition: NewAlso Replaces: MTX12-BS, YTX12-BS, M3RH25, ETX12-BS, GTX12-BS, UTX12-BS, 27821, GS71142, JIS 12-BS, PTX12-BS, Sears 4416, ES12-BS

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This battery is simply amazing
reviews.reviewText: So I messed up and forgot my keys in the ignition upon dismounting, my battery was completely drained by the time I got back and luckily I was able to jumpstart it again and it worked perfectly after that.If you know anything about motorcycle batteries then you're aware that after being fully drained they're most likely not gonna work for long, I made the same mistake a second time and after jumpstarting the completely drained battery it kept working like a charm even tho most bike owners I know told me that if that happened a second time I wouldn't be that lucky.This battery has saved me twice so far, and honestly I couldn't be happier I bought this one for my bike

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality for price!
reviews.reviewText: Received this battery, hooked it up to my Bonneville, it came fully charged and ready to go out of the box.The LCD screen display that it was fully charged, I used my battery tester and it confirmed the charge.It has been installed for a couple of months, so far so good, I will update this post once the battery goes out .I’m assuming that will be a couple of years from now time will tell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought a motorcycle, other owner put lawn mover battery in, had cranking amps but could not handle rampage of cycles needs, found this one online, received quick, installed , great fit, bike loves battery, been using a month, extremely pleased with coast and function.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The battery have a defect in it
reviews.reviewText: The battery have a defect in it I will like a replacement of the battery

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Battery lasted 2 months
reviews.reviewText: Bought this battery for my Honda ATV. It didn't last two months. We never left it on, didn't abuse it or anything. It simply got cold outside, and the battery doesn't hold a charge. The customer service website does not work, the phone number is just a voicemail that doesn't get returned and Amazon won't do anything about it. Save yourself the time and do not buy this product. Buy one locally where you can take it back to the store if you have issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow this is a nice battery
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Ok overall great battery I use this one on my 92 square noise Yamaha 650lx wave runner and it works great so 5 Stars plus the digital voltage meter is awesome!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my ATV that had been sitting dry for almost 7 years. I simply replaced the dry rotted carburetor and the old battery with this one. I had to do a lot of cranking on the battery to get it going and it never faltered. The voltage and the cranking amps stayed strong and consistent. A lesser battery would have worn down before the engine finally started. Very good battery for the price. The digital display on the top of the battery is very useful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Battery right size and bike cranked right up
reviews.reviewText: Easy install and fired my motorcycle right up
